subject: Tiếng Anh
title: Đề thi thử tiếng Anh Lớp 12 - MLPA - Đề số 1

questions.instructions: Read the following passage and mark the letter A, B, C or D on your answer sheet to indicate the option that best fits each of the numbered blanks from 1 to 6.
questions.title: DIGITAL WELL-BEING IN A CONNECTED WORLD
questions.passage:
As technology becomes an essential part of modern life, it’s important to prioritize digital well-being—the practice of using digital tools in a way that supports mental, emotional, and physical health. This concept encourages individuals to (1)_______ balance between screen time and real-world interactions.

People are now more aware of how excessive device use can negatively (2)_______ sleep, productivity, and relationships. By setting boundaries, such as turning off notifications or taking regular breaks, users can (3)_______ healthier digital habits.

Another key strategy is to (4)_______ mindful usage by choosing quality over quantity. Instead of endlessly scrolling through social media, individuals are encouraged to engage with content that (5)_______ learning, creativity, or meaningful connection.

Ultimately, digital well-being is about being intentional with technology. As more people (6)_______ this approach, a healthier digital future becomes more attainable.

group_questions.question: Question 1:
group_questions.explanation: Cụm từ 'maintain balance' (duy trì sự cân bằng) là một collocation (cụm từ thường đi với nhau) phổ biến. Các lựa chọn khác không phù hợp về nghĩa.

group_questions.question: Question 2:
group_questions.explanation: Từ cần điền phải có nghĩa là 'ảnh hưởng đến'. 'Affect' (ảnh hưởng) là lựa chọn đúng. 'Negatively affect' có nghĩa là ảnh hưởng một cách tiêu cực.

group_questions.question: Question 3:
group_questions.explanation: Từ 'promote' (thúc đẩy, phát triển) phù hợp với ngữ cảnh 'promote healthier digital habits' (thúc đẩy các thói quen kỹ thuật số lành mạnh hơn).

group_questions.question: Question 4:
group_questions.explanation: 'Encourage mindful usage' (khuyến khích việc sử dụng có chánh niệm) là phù hợp nhất với ý của câu là lựa chọn chất lượng thay vì số lượng.

group_questions.question: Question 5:
group_questions.explanation: 'Fosters' (nuôi dưỡng, bồi đắp) phù hợp với ngữ cảnh tích cực của việc học hỏi, sáng tạo và kết nối có ý nghĩa.

group_questions.question: Question 6:
group_questions.explanation: 'Adopt this approach' (áp dụng phương pháp này) là cách diễn đạt đúng để chỉ việc mọi người bắt đầu làm theo một cách tiếp cận mới.

questions.instructions: Read the following passage and mark the letter A, B, C or D on your answer sheet to indicate the option that best fits each of the numbered blanks from 7 to 12.
questions.title: HEALTHY EATING FOR A BETTER LIFE
questions.passage:
Developing healthy eating habits is one of the most effective ways to improve overall well-being. A balanced diet not only boosts energy levels but also helps (7)_______ the risk of chronic illnesses such as heart disease, diabetes, and obesity.

The first step is to (8)_______ processed foods that are high in sugar, salt, and unhealthy fats. Instead, focus on whole foods—like fruits, vegetables, grains, and lean proteins—which provide essential nutrients and support long-term health.

Portion control is another important factor. Eating mindfully and avoiding (9)_______ can prevent weight gain and digestive issues. Drinking enough water and limiting sugary beverages also (10)_______ a positive impact on metabolism and hydration.

Meal planning can be useful in making healthier choices. When you (11)_______ your meals in advance, you're less likely to rely on fast food or unhealthy snacks. Over time, consistent healthy choices can (12)_______ into lasting lifestyle changes.

group_questions.question: Question 7:
group_questions.explanation: Chế độ ăn cân bằng giúp 'reduce the risk' (giảm nguy cơ) mắc bệnh mãn tính. Đây là lựa chọn hợp lý nhất về mặt y học và ngữ cảnh.

group_questions.question: Question 8:
group_questions.explanation: 'Avoid processed foods' (tránh thực phẩm chế biến sẵn) là lời khuyên sức khỏe phổ biến và phù hợp với ý nghĩa của đoạn văn.

group_questions.question: Question 9:
group_questions.explanation: Trong ngữ cảnh về kiểm soát khẩu phần ăn, 'overeating' (ăn quá nhiều) là từ chính xác để chỉ nguyên nhân gây tăng cân.

group_questions.question: Question 10:
group_questions.explanation: Cụm từ 'have a positive impact on' (có tác động tích cực đến) là cách diễn đạt đúng và phổ biến trong tiếng Anh.

group_questions.question: Question 11:
group_questions.explanation: Ngữ cảnh nói về 'meal planning' (lên kế hoạch bữa ăn), do đó 'prepare your meals in advance' (chuẩn bị bữa ăn trước) là hợp lý nhất.

group_questions.question: Question 12:
group_questions.explanation: 'Develop into' (phát triển thành) phù hợp để diễn tả quá trình các lựa chọn nhỏ, nhất quán dần trở thành thay đổi lớn trong lối sống.

questions.instructions: Mark the letter A, B, C or D on your answer sheet to indicate the best arrangement of utterances or sentences to make a meaningful exchange or text in each of the following questions from 13 to 17.

question: a. Emma: I enjoy reading before bed. It helps me relax.
b. Emma: Mostly fiction. I love getting lost in stories.
c. Jack: That’s a nice routine. What kind of books do you read?
group_questions.explanation: Trình tự logic của cuộc hội thoại là: (a) Emma chia sẻ thói quen của mình -> (c) Jack hỏi thêm chi tiết về thói quen đó -> (b) Emma trả lời câu hỏi của Jack. Do đó, thứ tự đúng là a-c-b.

question: a. Mike: I’ve been trying to reduce my screen time lately.
b. Sarah: That’s smart. Too much screen time affects sleep.
c. Mike: Yeah, I’ve started reading physical books instead.
d. Sarah: Maybe I should do the same. My sleep has been terrible.
group_questions.explanation: Dòng chảy tự nhiên của cuộc trò chuyện là: (a) Mike nêu vấn đề -> (b) Sarah đồng tình và nêu hậu quả -> (c) Mike đưa ra giải pháp của mình -> (d) Sarah cân nhắc làm theo giải pháp đó. Do đó, thứ tự đúng là a-b-c-d.

question: Hi Daniel,
a. Have you looked into internship opportunities for the summer?
b. It’s great that you’re planning to gain real-world experience.
c. I know a few companies offering roles in marketing and tech.
d. Let me know if you’d like me to share the details.
e. Best of luck with your search!
Best,
Michael
group_questions.explanation: Thứ tự logic của email: (b) Lời khen ngợi mở đầu -> (a) Câu hỏi chính -> (c) Đưa ra thông tin hỗ trợ -> (d) Đề nghị giúp đỡ -> (e) Lời chúc kết thúc. Do đó, thứ tự đúng là b-a-c-d-e.

question: a. Traveling helps people explore new cultures and perspectives.
b. It also enhances personal growth and adaptability.
c. Trying local food and meeting locals are enriching experiences.
d. Planning ahead can save both time and money.
e. A travel journal is a great way to preserve memories.
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn văn có cấu trúc diễn dịch: (a) Nêu ý chính về lợi ích của du lịch -> (b) Bổ sung ý (also) -> (c) Đưa ra ví dụ cụ thể -> (d) Thêm một lợi ích khác -> (e) Nêu một hoạt động liên quan. Thứ tự a-b-c-d-e tạo ra một đoạn văn mạch lạc nhất.

question: a. Regular sleep patterns improve mental and physical health.
b. Many people sacrifice sleep for work or entertainment.
c. This often leads to fatigue, stress, and poor performance.
d. Developing a nighttime routine can help.
e. Prioritizing rest is key to overall well-being.
group_questions.explanation: Cấu trúc vấn đề - giải pháp: (b) Nêu thực trạng -> (c) Hậu quả của thực trạng đó -> (a) Nêu một sự thật đối lập/lý tưởng -> (d) Đưa ra giải pháp -> (e) Kết luận, nhấn mạnh tầm quan trọng. Thứ tự b-c-a-d-e là hợp lý nhất.

questions.instructions: Read the following passage about Jane Goodall and mark the letter A, B, C or D on your answer sheet to indicate the option that best fits each of the numbered blanks from 18 to 22.
questions.passage:
Jane Goodall, a renowned primatologist and conservationist, (18) __________ groundbreaking research on chimpanzee behavior in the wild. Beginning her work in Tanzania in the 1960s, she challenged long-held beliefs by showing that chimpanzees use tools and display human-like emotions.

Her unconventional approach, including giving names to the animals she studied, (19) __________ skepticism at first, but it ultimately changed the field of primatology forever. Over the decades, she (20) __________ tirelessly to promote wildlife conservation and animal welfare worldwide.

Today, Goodall is recognized not only for her scientific contributions but also for her passionate advocacy. Her Roots & Shoots program, (21) __________ in over 100 countries, empowers young people to take action for animals, people, and the environment.

(22) __________ her lifelong dedication, Goodall has become a symbol of hope and compassion in the face of environmental challenges.

group_questions.question: Question 18:
group_questions.explanation: Hành động nghiên cứu xảy ra và hoàn tất trong quá khứ (bắt đầu từ những năm 1960). Thì Quá khứ đơn (conducted) là phù hợp nhất.

group_questions.question: Question 19:
group_questions.explanation: Cụm động từ 'meet with skepticism' có nghĩa là 'vấp phải sự hoài nghi'. Đây là cách diễn đạt tự nhiên và phù hợp với ngữ cảnh.

group_questions.question: Question 20:
group_questions.explanation: Hành động làm việc không mệt mỏi kéo dài từ quá khứ ('Over the decades') cho đến hiện tại. Thì Hiện tại hoàn thành (has worked) diễn tả chính xác điều này.

group_questions.question: Question 21:
group_questions.explanation: Đây là dạng rút gọn mệnh đề quan hệ chủ động. 'Her Roots & Shoots program, which operates now...' có thể được rút gọn thành 'Her Roots & Shoots program, operating now...'.

group_questions.question: Question 22:
group_questions.explanation: 'Thanks to' (Nhờ vào) thể hiện nguyên nhân tích cực. Việc bà cống hiến cả đời đã giúp bà trở thành biểu tượng của hy vọng. Các lựa chọn khác không phù hợp về nghĩa.

questions.instructions: Read the following passage about Environmental Awareness and mark the letter A, B, C or D on your answer sheet to indicate the best answer to each of the following questions from 23 to 30.
questions.passage:
Environmental awareness refers to the understanding and knowledge that people have about the environment and the issues that threaten it. In recent decades, the increasing impact of climate change, deforestation, pollution, and loss of biodiversity has made environmental education more important than ever. Raising awareness is a crucial step in encouraging people to adopt more sustainable behaviors and to demand policies that protect the planet.

One significant aspect of environmental awareness is recognizing how human activities contribute to environmental degradation. From the overuse of fossil fuels to improper waste disposal, our actions directly affect the Earth’s ecosystems. For example, single-use plastics continue to pollute oceans and harm marine life, despite global efforts to reduce plastic consumption. Therefore, educating people about the consequences of their choices is a powerful tool for change.

Environmental campaigns and social media also play a vital role in spreading awareness. By sharing facts, stories, and practical tips, these platforms help people understand the urgency of the problem and how they can make a difference. More importantly, they inspire collective action. When communities come together—whether to plant trees, clean rivers, or push for renewable energy—they create lasting impact.

Schools and universities are increasingly incorporating environmental education into their curricula. Through interactive lessons and hands-on activities, students learn not just the science behind climate change, but also how to take action. In many places, young people are leading climate movements, proving that awareness can lead to real change when it is backed by education and activism.

Ultimately, promoting environmental awareness helps people make informed decisions that benefit both themselves and the planet. Whether it's reducing energy use, choosing eco-friendly products, or supporting green policies, individual efforts—when multiplied across millions—can contribute to a more sustainable future.

group_questions.question: The word “crucial” in paragraph 1 is CLOSEST in meaning to:
group_questions.explanation: Trong ngữ cảnh 'Raising awareness is a crucial step', từ 'crucial' có nghĩa là cực kỳ quan trọng, thiết yếu. 'Essential' là từ đồng nghĩa gần nhất.

group_questions.question: What is the main cause of environmental degradation according to paragraph 2?
options: A. Natural disasters and global warming
B. Lack of technology and education
C. Human activities such as pollution and waste
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn 2 nêu rõ: 'recognizing how human activities contribute to environmental degradation. From the overuse of fossil fuels to improper waste disposal...'

group_questions.question: According to the passage, what is the benefit of social media in environmental awareness?
options: B. It shares knowledge and motivates people to act.
C. It stops pollution from spreading.
D. It forces companies to change their products.
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn 3 chỉ ra: 'By sharing facts, stories, and practical tips, these platforms help people understand the urgency of the problem and how they can make a difference.'

group_questions.question: The word “they” in paragraph 3 refers to:
group_questions.explanation: Câu trước đó nói về 'When communities come together...'. Do đó, 'they' ở câu sau ('they create lasting impact') chính là 'communities'.

group_questions.question: Which of the following is TRUE according to paragraph 4?
options: A. Students are only taught about the dangers of climate change.
B. Environmental education is now a requirement in all schools.
C. Education encourages both knowledge and practical action.
D. Older people are more active than youth in environmental issues.
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn 4 nói rằng học sinh 'learn not just the science... but also how to take action', có nghĩa là giáo dục khuyến khích cả kiến thức và hành động thực tế.

group_questions.question: What can be inferred from the passage?
options: A. Individual actions can contribute to global sustainability.
B. People cannot change the environment without government help.
C. Awareness alone is enough to solve environmental problems.
D. Environmental problems only exist in developing countries.
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn cuối kết luận: 'individual efforts—when multiplied across millions—can contribute to a more sustainable future', cho thấy hành động cá nhân có thể đóng góp vào sự bền vững toàn cầu.

group_questions.question: Which paragraph mentions the role of schools in promoting environmental awareness?
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn 4 bắt đầu bằng câu: 'Schools and universities are increasingly incorporating environmental education into their curricula.'

group_questions.question: What is the main idea of the passage?
options: A. Environmental awareness is spreading thanks to social media.
B. Raising environmental awareness helps people take action for a greener future.
C. Education is the only way to stop climate change.
D. Governments need to lead environmental campaigns to save the Earth.
group_questions.explanation: Toàn bộ bài văn tập trung vào tầm quan trọng của việc nâng cao nhận thức về môi trường như một bước quan trọng để khuyến khích hành động bền vững, từ cá nhân đến cộng đồng.

questions.instructions: Read the following passage about Artificial Intelligence and mark the letter A, B, C or D on your answer sheet to indicate the best answer to each of the following questions from 31 to 40.
questions.passage:
Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly transforming industries and reshaping the way we live and work. From smart assistants and facial recognition to medical diagnostics and self-driving cars, AI technologies are becoming deeply integrated into modern society. While many celebrate its potential to improve efficiency and accuracy, others worry about ethical issues, data privacy, and job displacement.

AI’s impact is not felt equally across all sectors. In manufacturing, for example, automation powered by AI has led to the replacement of many routine jobs, while in healthcare, it supports professionals by analyzing complex data and assisting in diagnoses. [I] In education, AI tools are being used to personalize learning experiences, making lessons more engaging and tailored to individual students. [II] However, these benefits are not universal—regions with limited access to technology risk being left behind. [III] Addressing these inequalities is essential to ensure that AI promotes progress rather than deepening existing divides. [IV]

Governments and companies are now discussing ways to regulate AI and manage its growth responsibly. Debates center around how to ensure transparency in AI decisions and how to prevent biases from being embedded in algorithms. At the same time, experts emphasize the need to include diverse voices in AI development—so that the technology reflects a broader range of values and experiences.

Public awareness is also growing. People are beginning to question how AI affects their daily lives—from the content they see online to the way their data is collected and used. Youth activists, researchers, and civil rights organizations are calling for more ethical guidelines in AI deployment and more accountability from tech giants.

Despite uncertainties, AI holds great promise. If developed and governed responsibly, it can revolutionize fields from agriculture to environmental monitoring. But realizing this promise depends on global cooperation, inclusive development, and a shared commitment to human-centered technology.

group_questions.question: The word “transforming” in paragraph 1 is CLOSEST in meaning to:
group_questions.explanation: 'Transforming' có nghĩa là biến đổi, thay đổi một cách sâu sắc. 'Changing' là từ đồng nghĩa gần nhất.

group_questions.question: The word “it” in paragraph 2 refers to:
group_questions.explanation: Câu trước đó nói về 'automation powered by AI' và 'in healthcare, it supports...'. 'It' ở đây thay thế cho 'AI' để tránh lặp từ.

group_questions.question:
Where in paragraph 2 does the following sentence best fit?
“This has led to concerns about unequal benefits and digital gaps.”
group_questions.explanation: Câu trước [III] nói về 'benefits are not universal' và 'risk being left behind'. Câu cần chèn ('This has led to concerns about unequal benefits...') là một hệ quả trực tiếp của ý này.

group_questions.question: What is the main idea of paragraph 2?
options: A. AI is mostly harmful to developing countries.
B. The benefits and impacts of AI differ by industry and region.
C. AI in education will replace teachers.
D. All sectors benefit equally from AI.
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn 2 đưa ra các ví dụ về tác động khác nhau của AI trong các lĩnh vực (sản xuất, y tế, giáo dục) và khu vực, cho thấy lợi ích và tác động không đồng đều.

group_questions.question: The phrase “manage its growth responsibly” in paragraph 3 is best replaced by:
options: D. control how it expands safely
group_questions.explanation: 'Manage responsibly' có nghĩa là quản lý một cách có trách nhiệm. 'Control how it expands safely' (kiểm soát cách nó mở rộng một cách an toàn) thể hiện rõ nhất ý nghĩa này.

group_questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a concern about AI?
options: A. Job loss due to automation
C. Lack of interest in AI careers
group_questions.explanation: Bài đọc có đề cập đến 'job displacement' (mất việc), 'biases... in algorithms' (thiên vị), và 'data privacy' (quyền riêng tư dữ liệu). 'Lack of interest in AI careers' (thiếu hứng thú với ngành AI) không được đề cập.

group_questions.question: Why do experts call for diverse voices in AI development?
options: B. To ensure AI reflects a variety of human values
C. To speed up AI production
D. To reduce the cost of building AI systems
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn 3 nêu rõ lý do: 'so that the technology reflects a broader range of values and experiences' (để công nghệ phản ánh một phạm vi rộng hơn các giá trị và kinh nghiệm).

group_questions.question:
What does the underlined sentence in paragraph 5 suggest?
(“But realizing this promise depends on global cooperation, inclusive development, and a shared commitment to human-centered technology.”)
options: A. AI will benefit only wealthy nations.
B. AI can succeed without regulations.
C. Collaboration is key to using AI for good.
D. AI should not be developed anymore.
group_questions.explanation: Câu này nhấn mạnh rằng để hiện thực hóa lời hứa của AI, cần có sự hợp tác toàn cầu và phát triển bao trùm, cho thấy sự hợp tác là chìa khóa để sử dụng AI cho mục đích tốt.

group_questions.question: What can be inferred from the passage?
options: A. AI should be banned until it is fully understood.
B. AI will eventually replace all human workers.
C. Without regulation, AI may worsen social inequalities.
D. Everyone already benefits equally from AI.
group_questions.explanation: Bài đọc đề cập đến những lo ngại về 'deepening existing divides' và nhu cầu 'regulate AI', từ đó có thể suy ra rằng nếu không có quy định, AI có thể làm trầm trọng thêm sự bất bình đẳng xã hội.

group_questions.question: Which of the following best summarizes the entire passage?
options: A. AI offers great potential but requires ethical and inclusive development.
B. Artificial Intelligence is dangerous and must be stopped.
C. AI has replaced all jobs in most sectors.
D. Only governments can benefit from artificial intelligence.
group_questions.explanation: Bài văn trình bày hai mặt của AI: tiềm năng to lớn ('great promise') và những thách thức về đạo đức, bất bình đẳng, đòi hỏi sự phát triển có trách nhiệm và bao trùm. Lựa chọn A tóm tắt đầy đủ nhất ý này.

questions.instructions: Read the following advertisement about a new fitness app and mark the letter A, B, C or D on your answer sheet to indicate the option that best fits each of the numbered blanks from 1 to 6.
questions.title: GET FIT YOUR OWN WAY WITH FITZONE
questions.passage: “Are you ready to (1)_______ your fitness journey? Whether you prefer jogging in the park or lifting weights at the gym, we have something for everyone.” If you want a personalized experience (2)_______ your lifestyle, we’ve got you covered! FitZone is a (3)________ app that lets you track your progress, connect with friends, and find workout plans that match your goals. All you need to do is select your preferences, and you’ll (4)______ tailored routines in no time. Whether you want to (5)______ muscle or lose weight, FitZone makes it easy. If you’re (6)______ for motivation or simply a little push, we’re here to help you stay on track!

group_questions.question: Question 1:
group_questions.explanation: Cụm từ 'start your journey' (bắt đầu hành trình của bạn) là cách diễn đạt phổ biến và phù hợp nhất trong ngữ cảnh này.

group_questions.question: Question 2:
group_questions.explanation: Trong cấu trúc 'a personalized experience ... your lifestyle', giới từ 'to' được dùng để chỉ sự phù hợp, 'đo ni đóng giày' cho lối sống của bạn.

group_questions.question: Question 3:
group_questions.explanation: Theo quy tắc trật tự tính từ, tính từ chỉ tuổi tác/tình trạng (new) đứng trước danh từ bổ nghĩa (fitness). 'a new fitness app' là đúng.

group_questions.question: Question 4:
group_questions.explanation: 'Find' (tìm thấy) phù hợp với ý nghĩa bạn sẽ nhận được/khám phá ra các bài tập được thiết kế riêng ngay lập tức.

group_questions.question: Question 5:
group_questions.explanation: Cụm từ 'gain muscle' có nghĩa là tăng cơ, đối lập với 'lose weight' (giảm cân).

group_questions.question: Question 6:
group_questions.explanation: Cụm động từ 'looking for' có nghĩa là tìm kiếm. 'If you're looking for motivation' là cách diễn đạt đúng.

questions.instructions: Read the following flyer and mark the letter A, B, C or D on your answer sheet to indicate the option that best fits each of the numbered blanks from 7 to 12.
questions.title: Healthy Eating: Small Choices, Big Impact!
questions.passage:
Healthy food choices can make a huge difference in your health and well-being. Here are (7)______ helpful tips to start your journey toward a better lifestyle!

Facts to Remember: Eating lots of processed food can (8)______ health issues in the future. Instead, (9)______ fresh ingredients when cooking and avoid products with added preservatives. Try to (10)______ soda with water or juice, and (11)______ foods rich in fiber and nutrients. Finally, (12)______ meal plans in advance to avoid impulsive choices.

group_questions.question: Question 7:
group_questions.explanation: 'Tips' là danh từ đếm được số nhiều, do đó 'many' là lựa chọn phù hợp. 'Few' mang nghĩa tiêu cực (quá ít).

group_questions.question: Question 8:
group_questions.explanation: 'Develop health issues' có nghĩa là phát sinh các vấn đề sức khỏe. Các lựa chọn khác mang nghĩa giải quyết, giảm bớt hoặc tránh.

group_questions.question: Question 9:
group_questions.explanation: 'Select' (lựa chọn) phù hợp với lời khuyên nên dùng các nguyên liệu tươi sống khi nấu ăn.

group_questions.question: Question 10:
group_questions.explanation: 'Replace A with B' có nghĩa là thay thế A bằng B. 'Replace soda with water' là lời khuyên hợp lý.

group_questions.question: Question 11:
group_questions.explanation: 'Enjoy foods...' (thưởng thức các loại thực phẩm...) phù hợp với ngữ cảnh tích cực của việc ăn uống lành mạnh.

group_questions.question: Question 12:
group_questions.explanation: 'Prepare meal plans' có nghĩa là chuẩn bị kế hoạch bữa ăn, một thói quen được khuyến khích để ăn uống lành mạnh.

questions.instructions: Mark the letter A, B, C or D on your answer sheet to indicate the best arrangement of utterances or sentences to make a meaningful exchange or text in each of the following questions from 13 to 17.

question: a. David: That sounds great. What time should we meet?
b. Peter: David, are you free this afternoon for a walk in the park?
c. Peter: Let’s meet at 3 p.m. near the lake entrance.
group_questions.explanation: Trình tự logic: (b) Peter đưa ra lời mời -> (a) David đồng ý và hỏi thời gian -> (c) Peter đề xuất thời gian và địa điểm. Do đó, thứ tự đúng là b-a-c.

question: a. Ana: Did you have a nice weekend in the mountains?
b. Ben: Absolutely! The view was wonderful and the air was so fresh.
c. Ana: That’s great. Did you go for a hike there?
d. Ben: Yes, I did. I walked all the way up the highest trail.
group_questions.explanation: Dòng chảy hội thoại: (a) Ana hỏi thăm về chuyến đi -> (b) Ben trả lời tích cực -> (c) Ana hỏi thêm một câu hỏi cụ thể -> (d) Ben trả lời câu hỏi cụ thể đó. Thứ tự đúng là a-b-c-d.

question: Hi Rachel,
a. I'll prepare some food and drinks. See you there!
b. I'm having a birthday party this Saturday at my place.
c. Let me know if you can come. It will be a lot of fun.
d. The party starts at 6 p.m.
e. Hope you can make it.
Alex
group_questions.explanation: Cấu trúc của một email mời: (b) Thông báo sự kiện chính -> (d) Cung cấp thời gian -> (c) Yêu cầu xác nhận tham dự -> (a) Cung cấp thêm chi tiết -> (e) Lời chúc kết thư. Thứ tự b-d-c-a-e là hợp lý nhất.

question: a. Staying fit is not hard if you follow a few simple habits.
b. Also, eat more fruits and whole grains.
c. First, try jogging or walking at least 30 minutes a day.
d. Finally, drink plenty of water and avoid sugary drinks.
e. Small choices can make a huge difference in health.
group_questions.explanation: Cấu trúc liệt kê: (a) Câu chủ đề -> (c) 'First', bước đầu tiên -> (b) 'Also', bước bổ sung -> (d) 'Finally', bước cuối cùng -> (e) Câu kết luận. Thứ tự a-c-b-d-e là đúng nhất.

question: a. Technology has transformed communication in the 21st century.
b. smartphones, tablets, and the internet connect people instantly.
c. We can stay in touch with friends and family across the world.
d. However, we should use technology responsibly.
e. That way, it can become a powerful tool for everyone.
group_questions.explanation: Cấu trúc diễn dịch: (a) Câu chủ đề -> (b) Đưa ra ví dụ cụ thể -> (c) Hệ quả của các ví dụ đó -> (d) 'However', đưa ra một ý tương phản/khuyến cáo -> (e) Kết luận về hệ quả nếu làm theo khuyến cáo. Thứ tự a-b-c-d-e là mạch lạc nhất.

questions.instructions: Read the following passage about Steve Jobs and Innovation and mark the letter A, B, C or D on your answer sheet to indicate the option that best fits each of the numbered blanks from 18 to 22.
questions.title: Steve Jobs and Innovation
questions.passage: Steve Jobs, a remarkable entrepreneur, (18) __________. Born in 1955 in San Francisco, USA, Jobs co-founded Apple in 1976 with Steve Wozniak and Ronald Wayne. His ability to combine technology and artistry led Apple to become a world leader in innovation and design. During his years at Apple, Jobs (19) __________, creating products like the Macintosh, iPod, iPhone, and iPad. His forward-thinking and drive for perfection made him a legend in the technology industry. In 2011, after battling health issues, (20) __________. Jobs’ legacy is a perfect blend of creativity, perseverance, and a unique view of the future. (21) __________. His innovations continue to affect the way we communicate, work, and live. Jobs was not only a successful entrepreneur but also a symbol of creativity and innovation. (22) __________. His story inspires countless people to pursue their passions and make a difference in the world.

group_questions.question: Question 18: Complete the sentence: 'Steve Jobs, a remarkable entrepreneur, __________.'
options: A. made him a symbol of creativity
B. has become a symbol of creativity
C. having become a symbol of creativity
D. to become a symbol of creativity
group_questions.explanation: Câu cần một vị ngữ hoàn chỉnh. 'has become a symbol of creativity' là một vị ngữ ở thì hiện tại hoàn thành, phù hợp để nói về một di sản còn ảnh hưởng đến hiện tại.

group_questions.question: Question 19: Complete the sentence: '...Jobs __________, creating products...'
options: A. a remarkable combination of design and functionality
B. remarkable combination of design and functionality
C. having remarkable combination of design and functionality
D. to remarkable combination of design and functionality
group_questions.explanation: Câu này trong đề gốc có thể bị lỗi. Giả sử ý của câu là 'Jobs introduced a remarkable combination...', thì lựa chọn A là một cụm danh từ có thể làm bổ ngữ. Đây là câu hỏi có cấu trúc không rõ ràng.

group_questions.question: Question 20: Complete the sentence: 'In 2011, after battling health issues, __________.'
options: A. choosing to step down from his role at Apple
B. which made him step down from his role at Apple
C. he decided to step down from his role at Apple
D. his decision was to step down from his role at Apple
group_questions.explanation: Sau một cụm giới từ chỉ thời gian, câu cần một mệnh đề chính hoàn chỉnh (chủ ngữ + vị ngữ). 'he decided to step down...' là một mệnh đề hoàn chỉnh và hợp lý về mặt ngữ nghĩa.

group_questions.question: Question 21: Complete the sentence: 'Jobs’ legacy is a perfect blend... (21) __________.'
options: A. His ability to innovate comes from pure passion
B. Pure passion makes him innovate
D. Purely his passion comes from innovation
group_questions.explanation: Câu A tạo ra một sự nối tiếp ý nghĩa mạch lạc, giải thích nguồn gốc khả năng sáng tạo của Jobs đến từ đam mê.

group_questions.question: Question 22: Complete the sentence: 'Jobs was not only a successful entrepreneur... (22) __________.'
options: A. His achievements are recognized through numerous accolades
B. His numerous accolades are recognized through achievements
C. Awards were recognized by him
D. His recognition to accolades is numerous
group_questions.explanation: Câu A là câu hoàn chỉnh và hợp lý nhất về mặt ngữ nghĩa, nói rằng thành tựu của ông được công nhận qua nhiều giải thưởng.

questions.instructions: Read the following passage about Japanese Culture and mark the letter A, B, C or D on your answer sheet to indicate the best answer to each of the following questions from 23 to 30.
questions.title: Japanese Culture
questions.passage:
Japanese culture is a rich blend of traditions and modern innovations. Influenced by both internal customs and external exchanges, Japanese culture evolves while honoring its roots.

At the center of Japanese society lies a deep respect for harmony, discipline, and community. Traditional ceremonies, martial arts, and the tea ceremony reflect these values, emphasizing unity and simplicity in daily life.

Furthermore, Japanese cuisine is recognized globally for its artistry, balance of ingredients, and health benefits. Foods like sushi, tempura, and miso soup showcase a rich agricultural heritage and careful preparation techniques. Traditional clothing, such as the kimono, adds to the country's unique character and historical depth.

Today, in a rapidly changing world, Japanese culture maintains its traditions while embracing the future. The Japanese people celebrate their past, innovate in the present, and pass their traditions on to future generations. It is this ability to blend the old and the new that makes Japanese culture rich, adaptable, and distinctly its own.

group_questions.question: The word 'internal' in paragraph 1 is OPPOSITE in meaning to
group_questions.explanation: 'Internal' có nghĩa là bên trong, nội bộ. Từ trái nghĩa là 'external' (bên ngoài).

group_questions.question: Who plays a key role in Japanese society’s unity, according to the passage?
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn 2 nêu rõ: 'At the center of Japanese society lies a deep respect for harmony, discipline, and community... emphasizing unity'.

group_questions.question: The word 'rich' in paragraph 3 could be best replaced by
group_questions.explanation: Trong ngữ cảnh 'a rich agricultural heritage', từ 'rich' có nghĩa là phong phú, dồi dào. 'Abundant' là từ thay thế phù hợp nhất.

group_questions.question: How can the underlined sentence be best paraphrased? 'Traditional clothing, such as the kimono, adds to the country's unique character and historical depth.'
options: A. Kimono shows a simple style of Japanese culture.
B. Kimono highlights the rich character and deep history of Japan.
C. Traditional clothing weakens Japanese culture.
D. Kimono reflects a new form of attire in Japan.
group_questions.explanation: Câu gốc có nghĩa là kimono làm tăng thêm tính cách độc đáo và chiều sâu lịch sử. Câu B diễn đạt lại ý này một cách chính xác nhất.

group_questions.question: The word 'their' in paragraph 4 refers to __________.
group_questions.explanation: Câu 'The Japanese people celebrate their past...'. 'Their' ở đây rõ ràng là chỉ 'The Japanese people'.

group_questions.question: Which of the following is TRUE according to the passage?
options: A. Japanese culture has remained completely the same over time.
B. The community plays a key role in Japanese unity.
C. Japanese food is influenced by other cuisines.
D. Kimono is a modern piece of clothing in Japan.
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn 2 đã khẳng định vai trò của cộng đồng trong sự đoàn kết của xã hội Nhật Bản. Các lựa chọn khác đều sai theo thông tin trong bài.

group_questions.question: In which paragraph does the writer mention a present concession relationship?
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn 4 có câu 'Japanese culture maintains its traditions while embracing the future'. 'While' ở đây thể hiện mối quan hệ nhượng bộ (trong khi).

group_questions.question: In which paragraph does the writer state that Japanese culture evolves by blending traditions and innovations?
group_questions.explanation: Ngay đoạn 1, câu cuối đã nêu rõ 'Japanese culture evolves while honoring its roots' và nó là 'a rich blend of traditions and modern innovations'.

questions.instructions: Read the following passage about Social Media and mark the letter A, B, C or D on your answer sheet to indicate the best answer to each of the following questions from 31 to 40.
questions.title: Social Media
questions.passage:
Social media has become a huge part of our daily lives. It connects us with friends and family, lets us share photos and stories, and helps us stay informed about what’s going on in the world. However, many people are now wondering if spending too much time on social media is harmful.

The rise of smartphones and apps has made social media more accessible and more addictive. Instead of checking in once or twice a day, many people find themselves scrolling their feeds repeatedly, sometimes without even realizing it.

The content we see on social media is often carefully curated to show us a perfect lifestyle, which can affect how we view ourselves and our own happiness. [I] It can lead to comparisons with friends or celebrities and foster a feeling of inadequacy. [II] Furthermore, misinformation and sensational content can spread quickly, causing confusion and polarization. [III] In addition, social media companies use sophisticated algorithms to keep us engaged, adding to the problem. [IV]

Studies have shown that heavy social media use can affect mental health, causing stress, depression, and poor sleep. According to psychology experts, this happens because we constantly compare ourselves to unrealistic standards and become trapped in a cycle of negativity. Nonetheless, social media is not entirely harmful; it can be a powerful tool for education, creativity, and staying connected — if we use it wisely and in moderation.

group_questions.question: The word 'accessible' in paragraph 2 is OPPOSITE in meaning to __________.
group_questions.explanation: 'Accessible' có nghĩa là dễ tiếp cận, dễ dàng có được. Từ trái nghĩa phù hợp nhất là 'distant' (xa xôi, khó tiếp cận).

group_questions.question: Where in paragraph 3 does the following sentence best fit? 'There is a phenomenon called ‘social comparison’.'
group_questions.explanation: Câu cần chèn giới thiệu về hiện tượng 'social comparison'. Câu ngay sau vị trí [I] giải thích về hiện tượng đó ('It can lead to comparisons...'). Do đó, vị trí [I] là hợp lý nhất.

group_questions.question: Which of the following best summarizes paragraph 3?
options: A. Social media lets us connect with friends and family easily.
B. The rise of smartphones has made social media more popular.
C. Viewing curated content can affect our happiness and view of ourselves.
D. Misinformation is a growing problem on social media platforms.
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn 3 tập trung phân tích việc nội dung được chọn lọc cẩn thận trên mạng xã hội có thể ảnh hưởng đến cách chúng ta nhìn nhận bản thân và hạnh phúc như thế nào.

group_questions.question: The word 'it' in paragraph 4 refers to __________.
group_questions.explanation: Câu đó là 'it can be a powerful tool...'. Dựa vào ngữ cảnh của cả đoạn, 'it' ở đây đang nói về 'social media'.

group_questions.question: The phrase 'foster a feeling of' in paragraph 3 could be best replaced by __________.
group_questions.explanation: 'Foster' có nghĩa là nuôi dưỡng, tạo ra. 'Create' là từ thay thế gần nghĩa nhất.

group_questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as an effect of heavy social media use, according to the passage?
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn văn có đề cập đến 'stress', 'poor sleep' (ảnh hưởng sức khỏe tinh thần), và 'confusion' (do thông tin sai lệch), nhưng không đề cập trực tiếp đến 'physical health problems' (vấn đề sức khỏe thể chất).

group_questions.question: Which of the following is TRUE according to the passage?
options: A. Everyone finds social media harmful in all cases.
B. Few people check their smartphones more than once a day.
C. Misinformation can spread quickly through social media.
D. It’s impossible to use social media in a healthy way.
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn 3 có câu: 'misinformation and sensational content can spread quickly'.

group_questions.question: Which of the following best paraphrases the underlined sentence in paragraph 4?
options: A. We should avoid social media altogether.
B. Social media has only harmful effects.
C. It is a helpful tool when we use it carefully.
D. There is no way to control its effects.
group_questions.explanation: Câu gốc nói rằng MXH không hoàn toàn có hại và có thể là công cụ mạnh mẽ nếu được dùng một cách khôn ngoan và điều độ. Câu C diễn đạt lại chính xác ý này.

group_questions.question: Which of the following can be inferred from the passage?
options: A. The algorithm plays a small role in keeping people engaged.
B. Heavy social media use can affect both emotions and health.
C. Everyone reacts the same way to social media.
group_questions.explanation: Bài đọc nói rằng việc sử dụng MXH nhiều có thể gây ra 'stress, depression' (cảm xúc) và 'poor sleep' (sức khỏe). Từ đó có thể suy ra nó ảnh hưởng đến cả hai.

group_questions.question: Which of the following best summarizes the passage?
options: A. Social media is completely harmful and should be avoided.
B. The main problem is smartphones, not social media.
C. Social media has both benefits and drawbacks; we should use it in moderation.
D. There are no negative effects of social media if we use it wisely.
group_questions.explanation: Toàn bộ bài văn phân tích hai mặt của MXH: mặt kết nối, thông tin (lợi ích) và mặt gây nghiện, ảnh hưởng sức khỏe tinh thần (tác hại), và kết luận rằng nên sử dụng nó một cách điều độ.

subject: Tiếng Anh
title: Đề thi thử tiếng Anh Lớp 12 - Đề số 3

questions.instructions: Read the following passage about the sustainable living movement and mark the letter A, B, C or D on your answer sheet to indicate the option that best fits each of the numbered blanks from 1 to 6.
questions.title: LIVING GREEN: THE PATH TO SUSTAINABILITY
questions.passage:
Sustainable living is becoming more than just a trend—it’s a conscious decision to (1)_______ the planet’s limited resources while maintaining a high quality of life. Individuals who adopt this lifestyle often reduce waste, conserve energy, and make mindful choices about what they consume.

This movement encourages people to think (2)_______ about their habits—from the food they eat to how they travel. While going green may seem overwhelming at first, small steps such as recycling or using reusable bags can (3)_______ significant long-term impact.

One important element of sustainability is supporting local and organic products, which not only benefits your health but also helps (4)_______ pollution caused by mass production and transportation. Additionally, energy-efficient appliances and solar power systems are gaining popularity as they help homeowners (5)_______ both money and the environment.

Ultimately, sustainable living is about being aware of how everyday actions (6)_______ the world. With more people embracing this mindset, a cleaner, healthier planet is within reach.

group_questions.question: Question 1:
group_questions.explanation: 'Preserve' (bảo tồn) phù hợp với ý nghĩa của lối sống bền vững là bảo vệ các nguồn tài nguyên hạn chế của hành tinh.

group_questions.question: Question 2:
group_questions.explanation: 'Think responsibly' (suy nghĩ một cách có trách nhiệm) phù hợp với ngữ cảnh đưa ra các lựa chọn có ý thức về thói quen của mình.

group_questions.question: Question 3:
group_questions.explanation: 'Generate significant long-term impact' có nghĩa là tạo ra tác động lớn dài hạn. 'Generate' là lựa chọn phù hợp nhất.

group_questions.question: Question 4:
group_questions.explanation: Hỗ trợ sản phẩm địa phương giúp 'eliminate' (loại bỏ, giảm thiểu) ô nhiễm gây ra bởi sản xuất hàng loạt và vận chuyển.

group_questions.question: Question 5:
group_questions.explanation: Cụm từ 'save money' (tiết kiệm tiền) là một collocation phổ biến. Các thiết bị tiết kiệm năng lượng giúp tiết kiệm cả tiền bạc và môi trường.

group_questions.question: Question 6:
group_questions.explanation: 'Affect' (ảnh hưởng đến) là động từ trung tính phù hợp nhất để diễn tả cách các hành động hàng ngày tác động đến thế giới.

questions.instructions: Read the following flyer and mark the letter A, B, C or D on your answer sheet to indicate the option that best fits each of the numbered blanks from 7 to 12.
questions.title: Achieving Digital Balance: Reclaiming Control in a Connected World
questions.passage:
In an era dominated by smartphones and instant communication, maintaining digital well-being has become increasingly crucial. Many individuals unknowingly fall into habits that (7)_______ their mental clarity and overall productivity.

One key principle is to (8)_______ boundaries between online and offline life. For instance, disabling non-essential notifications can significantly (9)_______ distractions and help you stay focused. Additionally, consciously choosing to (10)_______ from screens before bedtime improves sleep quality and cognitive function.

To foster healthier digital habits, it is helpful to use apps that (11)_______ screen time and encourage mindful usage. Most importantly, (12)_______ regular offline activities—such as reading, exercising, or engaging in face-to-face conversations—helps restore balance in an overly digital lifestyle.

group_questions.question: Question 7:
group_questions.explanation: 'Compromise' (làm tổn hại, làm suy yếu) phù hợp với ngữ cảnh tiêu cực về các thói quen ảnh hưởng đến sự minh mẫn và năng suất.

group_questions.question: Question 8:
group_questions.explanation: Cụm từ 'establish boundaries' (thiết lập ranh giới) là một collocation có nghĩa là tạo ra các quy tắc rõ ràng.

group_questions.question: Question 9:
group_questions.explanation: 'Minimize distractions' (giảm thiểu sự xao nhãng) là kết quả logic của việc tắt thông báo.

group_questions.question: Question 10:
group_questions.explanation: 'Disconnect from screens' (ngắt kết nối khỏi màn hình) là cách nói trực tiếp và phổ biến nhất để chỉ việc ngừng sử dụng thiết bị điện tử.

group_questions.question: Question 11:
group_questions.explanation: 'Monitor screen time' (theo dõi thời gian sử dụng màn hình) là chức năng chính của các ứng dụng giúp quản lý sức khỏe kỹ thuật số.

group_questions.question: Question 12:
group_questions.explanation: 'Prioritize' (ưu tiên) phù hợp với việc nhấn mạnh tầm quan trọng của các hoạt động ngoại tuyến để khôi phục lại sự cân bằng.

questions.instructions: Mark the letter A, B, C or D on your answer sheet to indicate the best arrangement of utterances or sentences to make a meaningful exchange or text in each of the following questions from 13 to 17.

question: a. James: That’s true. It also lets you revisit the lectures anytime.
b. James: I can adjust my schedule and still keep up.
c. Anna: I find online classes more flexible than traditional ones.
group_questions.explanation: Trình tự logic: (c) Anna nêu quan điểm về tính linh hoạt -> (a) James đồng tình và bổ sung một lợi ích khác -> (b) James đưa ra ví dụ cá nhân về sự linh hoạt đó. Do đó, thứ tự đúng là c-a-b.

question: a. Tom: I’ve started doing short morning workouts, just 15 minutes.
b. Tom: Exactly. I feel more energetic throughout the day.
c. Jerry: That’s a good habit! Even short sessions make a difference.
d. Jerry: I should try that too. It sounds manageable.
group_questions.explanation: Dòng chảy hội thoại: (a) Tom chia sẻ thói quen mới -> (c) Jerry khen ngợi và đồng tình -> (b) Tom nói về kết quả tích cực -> (d) Jerry được truyền cảm hứng và muốn thử. Thứ tự đúng là a-c-b-d.

question: Hi Rachel,
a. Have you checked scholarship options or university partnerships?
b. I’m excited to hear you’re considering studying in Germany.
c. Let me know if you need help preparing your application.
d. The courses there are top-notch, especially in engineering and IT.
e. Wishing you the best!
Best regards,
Sophie
group_questions.explanation: Cấu trúc của một email: (b) Bày tỏ sự vui mừng về thông tin đã biết -> (d) Cung cấp thêm thông tin tích cực -> (a) Đặt câu hỏi gợi ý -> (c) Đề nghị giúp đỡ -> (e) Lời chúc kết thư. Thứ tự b-d-a-c-e là hợp lý nhất.

question: a. A balanced diet plays a vital role in maintaining good health.
b. It should include fruits, vegetables, proteins, and whole grains.
c. Drinking enough water is equally important.
d. In addition, regular exercise strengthens both body and mind.
e. Avoiding processed food can also prevent many health issues.
group_questions.explanation: Cấu trúc diễn dịch: (a) Câu chủ đề -> (b) Yếu tố 1 của chế độ ăn -> (e) Yếu tố 2 của chế độ ăn -> (d) 'In addition', bổ sung một yếu tố khác (tập thể dục) -> (c) Yếu tố cuối cùng (nước). Thứ tự a-b-e-d-c là mạch lạc nhất.

question: a. Strong passwords and two-factor authentication can boost security.
b. As we spend more time online, protecting digital identity becomes essential.
c. Many users still ignore basic safety practices, risking data breaches.
d. It's also wise to avoid suspicious links and unverified downloads.
e. Staying informed is the first step to staying safe.
group_questions.explanation: Cấu trúc Vấn đề - Giải pháp: (b) Nêu bối cảnh và tầm quan trọng -> (c) Nêu vấn đề/thực trạng -> (a) Giải pháp 1 -> (d) Giải pháp 2 ('also') -> (e) Câu kết luận. Thứ tự b-c-a-d-e là logic nhất.

questions.instructions: Read the following passage about Alan Turing and mark the letter A, B, C or D on your answer sheet to indicate the option that best fits each of the numbered blanks from 18 to 22.
questions.title: Alan Turing
questions.passage:
Alan Turing, a brilliant mathematician and logician, (18) __________ a pivotal role in the development of modern computer science. His groundbreaking work on the concept of a “universal machine” laid the theoretical foundation for the digital computers we use today.

During World War II, Turing (19) __________ for his crucial contributions to breaking the German Enigma code, which significantly shortened the war and saved countless lives. Despite his wartime achievements, he faced persecution due to his sexual orientation, leading to his tragic death in 1954.

(20) __________, Turing’s legacy has grown stronger over time. In recent decades, he has been widely acknowledged as one of the founding figures of artificial intelligence. The Turing Test, (21) __________, remains a key benchmark in AI development.

(22) __________, his life and work highlight the importance of both intellectual courage and societal acceptance.

group_questions.question: Question 18:
group_questions.explanation: Hành động xảy ra và hoàn tất trong quá khứ, liên quan đến một người đã qua đời. Thì Quá khứ đơn (played) là lựa chọn chính xác.

group_questions.question: Question 19:
group_questions.explanation: Câu cần dạng bị động ('được nhớ đến'). 'is best remembered' là cấu trúc bị động ở thì hiện tại đơn, phù hợp để nói về một sự thật được công nhận rộng rãi.

group_questions.question: Question 20:
group_questions.explanation: 'Over time' (Theo thời gian) là trạng từ nối phù hợp nhất để chỉ sự thay đổi, rằng di sản của Turing ngày càng lớn mạnh sau khi ông qua đời.

group_questions.question: Question 21:
options: A. developed by him in secrecy
B. which he had secretly developed
group_questions.explanation: Đây là một mệnh đề quan hệ không xác định (non-defining relative clause) cung cấp thêm thông tin về 'The Turing Test'. 'which he proposed in 1950' là mệnh đề hoàn chỉnh và chính xác về mặt lịch sử.

group_questions.question: Question 22:
group_questions.explanation: 'All in all' (Nhìn chung, tóm lại) là cụm từ phù hợp để đưa ra một nhận định tổng kết về cuộc đời và sự nghiệp của Turing.

questions.instructions: Read the following passage about Digital Literacy and mark the letter A, B, C or D on your answer sheet to indicate the best answer to each of the following questions from 23 to 30.
questions.title: Digital Literacy
questions.passage:
In the digital age, being able to use technology is no longer optional—digital literacy has become a vital life skill. It involves the ability to find, evaluate, and communicate information through digital platforms, including social media, websites, and mobile apps. More than just technical know-how, digital literacy also includes the critical thinking needed to navigate the internet safely and responsibly.

One essential aspect of digital literacy is the ability to recognize credible sources. With the rise of misinformation online, users must learn how to verify content before sharing it. Understanding how algorithms influence what we see on our feeds is also key to becoming informed digital citizens.

Digital literacy is not limited to young people. While many associate it with tech-savvy youth, older generations are also embracing digital tools to stay connected and informed. Education systems around the world are now integrating digital skills into their curricula, preparing learners of all ages for a technology-driven future.

Ultimately, fostering digital literacy empowers individuals to participate actively in the modern world. Whether applying for jobs, engaging in civic discussions, or accessing online services, being digitally literate ensures no one is left behind in our increasingly connected society.

group_questions.question: The word 'vital' in paragraph 1 is CLOSEST in meaning to:
group_questions.explanation: 'Vital' có nghĩa là thiết yếu, cực kỳ quan trọng. 'Necessary' là từ đồng nghĩa gần nhất.

group_questions.question: According to paragraph 1, digital literacy includes:
options: A. the ability to code and program
B. understanding how to install software
C. critical thinking and safe internet use
D. knowing how to design websites
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn 1 nêu: 'digital literacy also includes the critical thinking needed to navigate the internet safely and responsibly'.

group_questions.question: What is mentioned as a challenge related to digital literacy?
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn 2 nói: 'One essential aspect... is the ability to recognize credible sources. With the rise of misinformation...'. Việc xác định nội dung đáng tin cậy là một thách thức.

group_questions.question: The word 'it' in paragraph 2 refers to:
group_questions.explanation: Câu trước đó nói về 'verify content before sharing it'. 'It' ở đây thay thế cho 'content'.

group_questions.question: Which of the following is TRUE, according to the passage?
options: A. Only young people can master digital literacy.
B. Digital literacy excludes older generations.
C. Social media is not included in digital literacy.
D. Schools have started teaching digital skills.
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn 3 có câu: 'Education systems around the world are now integrating digital skills into their curricula'.

group_questions.question: What can be inferred from paragraph 3?
options: A. Digital skills are relevant to people of all ages.
B. Older people avoid technology due to fear.
C. All countries neglect digital education.
D. Digital tools are mostly for entertainment.
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn 3 nói rằng kỹ năng số không chỉ giới hạn ở người trẻ và các hệ thống giáo dục đang chuẩn bị cho 'learners of all ages', cho thấy nó phù hợp với mọi lứa tuổi.

group_questions.question: In which paragraph does the author mention the role of education in digital literacy?
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn 3 nói rõ về việc các hệ thống giáo dục trên thế giới đang tích hợp kỹ năng số vào chương trình giảng dạy.

group_questions.question: What is the main idea of the passage?
options: A. Digital literacy is a modern trend limited to the youth.
B. Digital skills help people avoid online misinformation.
C. The internet is full of risks that require strict regulations.
D. Digital literacy is essential for everyone in a connected world.
group_questions.explanation: Toàn bộ bài đọc nhấn mạnh tầm quan trọng của kỹ năng số như một 'vital life skill' cho tất cả mọi người để tham gia vào thế giới hiện đại.

questions.instructions: Read the following passage about Climate Change and mark the letter A, B, C or D on your answer sheet to indicate the best answer to each of the following questions from 31 to 40.
questions.title: Climate Change
questions.passage:
Climate change has emerged as one of the most pressing global challenges of the 21st century. Fueled largely by human activities such as burning fossil fuels, deforestation, and industrial pollution, it leads to rising global temperatures, erratic weather patterns, and an increase in natural disasters. The consequences of these changes are not abstract—they are already affecting ecosystems, economies, and communities worldwide.

What makes climate change particularly complex is its unequal impact. Developing nations, which have historically contributed the least to greenhouse gas emissions, often bear the brunt of its effects. Rising sea levels threaten low-lying countries, while droughts and floods undermine food and water security in regions with limited resources. Meanwhile, wealthier nations possess greater means to adapt, raising concerns about environmental justice.

International agreements such as the Paris Accord aim to reduce emissions and encourage sustainable development. However, critics argue that promises made in such agreements often fall short of meaningful action. [I] Others believe that individual behavior plays just as vital a role as governmental policy. [II] Educating communities, investing in renewable energy, and adopting eco-friendly lifestyles are all part of a multi-level solution. [III] Despite efforts, global carbon emissions continue to rise, prompting scientists to warn of irreversible damage if bold measures are not taken immediately. [IV]

In recent years, youth-led climate movements have gained momentum. Students, activists, and even scientists have taken to the streets to demand urgent change. Their message is clear: future generations will suffer the consequences of today’s inaction. These voices are not simply emotional appeals—they are grounded in scientific evidence and moral responsibility.

Ultimately, the path forward requires collaboration at every level. Governments must enact policies that limit emissions. Corporations must adopt cleaner practices. And individuals must make choices that reflect environmental awareness. While the challenge is daunting, collective responsibility offers the only viable path to a stable and livable planet.

group_questions.question: The word “pressing” in paragraph 1 is CLOSEST in meaning to:
group_questions.explanation: 'Pressing' có nghĩa là cấp bách, khẩn cấp. 'Urgent' là từ đồng nghĩa gần nhất.

group_questions.question: The word “they” in paragraph 1 refers to:
group_questions.explanation: Câu trước đó nói về 'The consequences of these changes'. 'They' ở câu sau ('they are already affecting...') thay thế cho 'consequences'.

group_questions.question: Where in paragraph 3 does the following sentence best fit? 'Nonetheless, many citizens feel powerless in the face of such a vast issue.'
group_questions.explanation: Vị trí [II] đứng giữa ý kiến về vai trò của hành vi cá nhân và các giải pháp cụ thể. Câu cần chèn ('Tuy nhiên, nhiều người cảm thấy bất lực...') tạo ra sự chuyển tiếp hợp lý, giải thích tại sao cần có những giải pháp cụ thể đó.

group_questions.question: Which of the following is a main idea of paragraph 2?
options: A. Rich nations have solved their climate problems.
B. Developing countries are responsible for most carbon emissions.
C. Climate change impacts some countries more than others.
D. International help is unnecessary for small countries.
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn 2 tập trung nói về 'unequal impact' (tác động không đồng đều) của biến đổi khí hậu, nơi các quốc gia đang phát triển chịu ảnh hưởng nặng nề hơn.

group_questions.question: The phrase “fall short of meaningful action” in paragraph 3 is best replaced by:
options: A. fail to achieve real results
group_questions.explanation: Cụm từ này có nghĩa là không đạt được, thiếu hụt so với hành động có ý nghĩa. 'Fail to achieve real results' (thất bại trong việc đạt được kết quả thực sự) diễn đạt lại ý này tốt nhất.

group_questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a solution to climate change?
group_questions.explanation: Bài đọc có đề cập đến 'renewable energy', 'Educating communities', và 'adopting eco-friendly lifestyles'. 'Promoting public transport' (thúc đẩy giao thông công cộng) không được nhắc đến.

group_questions.question: According to the passage, why are youth-led climate movements significant?
options: A. They rely solely on emotional speeches.
B. They propose unrealistic climate goals.
C. They are based on science and moral responsibility.
D. They are mostly organized by governments.
group_questions.explanation: Đoạn 4 nêu rõ: 'These voices are not simply emotional appeals—they are grounded in scientific evidence and moral responsibility'.

group_questions.question: What does the underlined sentence in paragraph 5 suggest?
options: A. Climate change is easy to overcome individually.
B. Only governments can fix climate issues.
C. Climate change cannot be solved anymore.
D. Everyone must work together to solve the problem.
group_questions.explanation: Câu này nhấn mạnh rằng 'collective responsibility' (trách nhiệm tập thể) là con đường duy nhất, cho thấy tất cả mọi người phải cùng nhau hành động.

group_questions.question: What can be inferred from the passage?
options: A. The future of the planet depends only on youth action.
B. Carbon emissions are now under control thanks to global policies.
C. Wealthy countries should not be involved in climate agreements.
D. Global cooperation is crucial to address climate change.
group_questions.explanation: Bài đọc nhấn mạnh vai trò của 'International agreements', 'multi-level solution', và 'collaboration at every level', từ đó có thể suy ra hợp tác toàn cầu là rất quan trọng.

group_questions.question: Which of the following best summarizes the entire passage?
options: A. Climate change affects only poor countries.
B. International agreements have eliminated climate-related problems.
C. Despite challenges, solving climate change requires action at all levels.
D. Climate change has been resolved through youth-led efforts.
group_questions.explanation: Bài văn trình bày biến đổi khí hậu là một thách thức toàn cầu với nhiều phức tạp, và nhấn mạnh giải pháp đòi hỏi sự hợp tác và hành động ở mọi cấp độ (chính phủ, tập đoàn, cá nhân).
